attributes.action: Only Members from fully-vaccinated households may vote to mandate any vaccine
attributes.additional_details: To ensure that it may be independently verified that members of government rely upon their own firsthand experience of the concerns with long term safety of experimental or novel-application vaccine or/and vaccine programmes, an/or other medical treatments or interventions of any kind, in order that they may acquire a deeper and fully relevant understanding of both the universal and the individual safety concerns of the broader demographic of those they claim to serve or/and represent.
attributes.background: Introduce legislation to exclude all Member/s in both Houses from voting upon passage of legislation mandating or otherwise compelling in any manner a vaccination or medical treatment/intervention, whose own households are not already verified as fully compliant with the intervention/s under vote.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. There are no proposals, and therefore no planned votes, on compulsary vaccination, which are currently illegal.
